item.title: CVE-2024-2725|2024-03-22T13:35:27.409Z -- ciges -- cigesv2
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in the CIGESv2 system. A remote attacker might be able to access /vendor/composer/installed.json and retrieve all installed packages used by the application.
